protocol.description: oidc|openstack, protocol of the authentication mechanism.

issuerUrl.description: (oidc) endpoint URL of the OpenID provider

requestParams.description: (oidc) additional parameters for the request to the OpenID provider

authEndpoint.description: (openstack) auth api endpoint, Required if protocol is not 'openstack'.

authMethod.description: (openstack) auth method (password|token|external), Required if protocol is not 'openstack'.

authToken.description: (openstack) auth token. You can use a openstack auth token to authenticate the user.

scopeProjectId.description: (openstack) scope project id. If specified, no domainId or domain is required.

scopeProjectName.description: (openstack) scope project name. DomainId or domain is required!

userDomainId.description: (openstack) user domain id. Required if userDomain is not specified!

userDomain.description: (openstack) user domain name. Required if userDomainId is not specified!

showScopeForm.description: (openstack) if false then show only user/password fields.

userName.description: (openstack) user name. That will prefill user name field.

initialLogin.description: trigger login process automatically on load press. Possible values are 'true' or 'false' (default)

mock.description: mock the auth data, allowed values are 'true', 'false' (default), or json (pure or base64 encoded)
